Package org.myshelfie.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Describes the board on which the tiles are placed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructor of the Board class. Will set all the Tiles to null.

    • Board

      public Board(int numPlayers)
      Constructor of the board class. Depending on the number of the players, only enables certain Tile boxes (and set the others to null)
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - : The number of players in the game

  • Method Details

    • applyMask

      private void applyMask(int numPlayers)
      Set to null the tile boxes in the board that should not be used in the game, depending on the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - : The number of players in the game

    • refillBoard

      public void refillBoard(int numPlayers, TileBag bag) throws WrongArgumentException
      Refill the board.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players
      bag - The bag of Tiles
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException

    • isRefillNeeded

      public boolean isRefillNeeded()
      Check whether the board needs to be refilled or not
      Returns:
      true if the board needs to be refilled, false otherwise

    • hasOneOrMoreFreeBorders

      public boolean hasOneOrMoreFreeBorders(int row, int col)
      Check whether a tile has at least one free border or not
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the tile
      col - The column of the tile
      Returns:
      true if the tile has at least one free border, false otherwise

    • isFreeTileBox

      private boolean isFreeTileBox(int row, int col)
      Check whether a tile box is free or not
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the tile
      col - The column of the tile box
      Returns:
      true if the tile box is free, false otherwise

    • setTile

      public void setTile(int x, int y, Tile t)
      Place a tile in the board, in the specified position. Notify the that the board has changed.
      Parameters:
      x - The row where the tile will be placed
      y - The column where the tile will be placed
      t - The tile to be placed

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int x, int y)

    • removeTile

      public Tile removeTile(int x, int y)
      Remove a tile from the board, in the specified position, by setting it to null.
      Parameters:
      x - The row where the tile will be removed
      y - The column where the tile will be removed
      Returns:
      The tile that has been removed
